project.title: Euro area current account – by main counterparties

1.title: Balance
1.definition: Current account balance (credits minus debits, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564068909178.title: Credits
c1564068909178.definition: Current account credits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564068910267.title: Debits
c1564068910267.definition: Current account debits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564068912843.title: Balance ratio
c1564068912843.definition: Current account balance as a percentage of gross domestic product (GDP) at market prices (credits minus debits, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working-day adjusted; BPM6 and ESA 2010 standards).

c1564068914122.title: Credits ratio
c1564068914122.definition: Current account credits as a percentage of gross domestic product (GDP) at market prices (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working-day adjusted; BPM6 and ESA 2010 standards).

c1564068923105.title: Debits ratio
c1564068923105.definition: Current account debits as a percentage of gross domestic product (GDP) at market prices (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working-day adjusted; BPM6 and ESA 2010 standards).

c1564069009278.title: Balance
c1564069009278.definition: Current account, goods, balance (exports minus imports, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069010262.title: Exports
c1564069010262.definition: Current account, goods, exports (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069011133.title: Imports
c1564069011133.definition: Current account, goods, imports (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069099259.title: Balance
c1564069099259.definition: Current account, services, balance (exports minus imports, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069100395.title: Exports
c1564069100395.definition: Current account, services, exports (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069101212.title: Imports
c1564069101212.definition: Current account, services, imports (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069138405.title: Balance
c1564069138405.definition: Current account, primary income balance (credits minus debits, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069139195.title: Credits
c1564069139195.definition: Current account, primary income credits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069140068.title: Debits
c1564069140068.definition: Current account, primary income debits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069182310.title: Balance
c1564069182310.definition: Current account, secondary income balance (credits minus debits, transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069183037.title: Credits
c1564069183037.definition: Current account, secondary income credits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).

c1564069183806.title: Debits
c1564069183806.definition: Current account, secondary income debits (transactions vis-à-vis non-residents; four-quarter cumulated; not seasonally or working day-adjusted; BPM6 standards).
